pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extreme Value Analysis for Circular Data // General functions for performing extreme value analysis on a circular domain as part of the statistical methodology in the paper by Konzen, E., Neves, C., and Jonathan, P. (2021). Modeling nonstationary extremes of storm severity: Comparing parametric and semiparametric inference. Environmetrics, 32(4), e2667.
